report:
**Oracle Weekly Crypto Outlook**
**Week of February 25 - March 03**
**Issued: February 25, 2026 at 14:57 UTC**

**Executive Summary**
Neutral regime detected (68% confidence). Top edge: BITCOIN NO with +58.0% edge.

**Market Regime**
Current Regime: Neutral
Confidence: 68%
Fear & Greed: 11 (Extreme Fear)

**Why Oracle Believes This**
- Extreme fear readings historically precede reversals

**Trades Identified (DRY RUN)**
- NO BITCOIN | Will the price of Bitcoin be above $64,000 on Febr | $25 @ 85% | edge +58.0% | conviction HIGH | FILLED
- NO ETHEREUM | Will the price of Ethereum be above $1,900 on Febr | $25 @ 81% | edge +57.0% | conviction HIGH | FILLED

**Risk Radar**
- BTC invalidation: drop below $61,388 (-8%) triggers mid-week review
- Black swan watch: regulatory actions, exchange incidents, macro surprises


**Final Action Plan**
- If you do nothing else: NO BITCOIN (Will the price of Bitcoin be above $64,0)
- Best move this week: let Oracle execute and monitor via dashboard
